name: UIVibrancyEffect
desc: An object that amplifies and adjusts the color of the content layered behind a visual effect view.

items.name: init(blurEffect: UIBlurEffect, style: UIVibrancyEffectStyle)
items.desc: Creates a vibrancy effect with the specified blur and style values.

items.name: init(blurEffect: UIBlurEffect)
items.desc: Creates a vibrancy effect for a specific blur effect.
